ch.iserver.ace.net.core
Class NetworkProperties

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.core.NetworkProperties

public class NetworkProperties
extends Object

Static class for the central access to network properties. All properties concerning the network layer are read from this class. All property values are stored in a file named net.properties.

Field Summary
static String KEY_DEFAULT_ENCODING
          Key for the default encoding used by ACE.
static String KEY_INITIAL_WAITINGTIME
          Key for retry strategy used for DNSSD calls.
static String KEY_NUMBER_OF_RETRIES
          Key for retry strategy used for DNSSD calls.
static String KEY_PROFILE_URI
          Key for the profile URI of the ACE protocol.
static String KEY_PROTOCOL_PORT
          Key for the protocol port.
static String KEY_PROTOCOL_VERSION
          Key for the protocol version.
static String KEY_REGISTRATION_TYPE
          Key for the registration type (Bonjour specific).
static String KEY_SUBSEQUENT_WAITINGTIME
          Key for retry strategy used for DNSSD calls.
static String KEY_TXT_VERSION
          Key for the TXT version (version TXT record protocol, Bonjour specific).
